pages.title: How will you plan to achieve social value through explicit delivery of this specific grant?

components.content: MHCLG aims to secure and maximise tangible social value benefits as outlined under the wellbeing theme in the Social Value Model. This includes improving health and wellbeing and community cohesion. For example, integration support and dealing with trauma.
